For more on how #NC07 citizens have benefited from #taxreform, please click here --> https://t.co/1opXcTxxhi #taxreform #taxday
Thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, #NC07 families will be able to keep more of their money as a result of the doubling of the child tax credit from $1,000 to $2,000.  #taxreform #taxday

Nearly doubling the standard deduction will allow individuals & married couples to keep more of their hard-earned money.  #NC07 example --> Michael from Ocean Isle Beach who shared with my office that he’s now able to “afford the new car I was so badly needing.” #taxreform

Since the enactment of the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, more than 4 million Americans are seeing pay raises and benefits.  #NC07 example --> Atlantic Packaging, headquartered in ILM, which has given its employees a $1,000 bonus #taxreform #taxday

In honor of #TaxDay, I want to share some of the benefits of #taxreform 1. Relief to main street job creators.  2.  Nearly doubling the standard deduction.  3.  Expanding the child tax credit.  4  Repealing the unfair individual mandate

This time next year, Americans will file their taxes under a fairer, simpler tax system that will improve the standard of living for Americans, strengthen our economy and bring jobs back. #TaxDay #taxreform

The #SyriaStrike sends a clear message to our enemies who engage in this despicable behavior.  I know every citizen joins me in saying a special thanks to all the brave men and women who serve our country and make it the greatest force mankind has ever known.

Russia and Iran are equally responsible for they are, if nothing else, financing Assad and keeping his regime propped up.  I'm pleased to see @realDonaldTrump respond and lead our country and Allies in significantly degrading Assad’s chemical weapon capabilities.  #Syria

I applaud the Trump Administration for taking action against brutal dictator Bashar al-Assad.  This is not the first time his regime has deployed chemical weapons on defenseless civilians, including women and children. #Syria

Today, the #USDA & #USTR finalized technical requirements allowing U.S. pork to be imported into Argentina.  It's estimated that Argentina has the potential for a $10M/year market for #pork. This announcement is welcomed news for North Carolina pork producers & the economy! #ag

The #FarmBill streamlines & reduces regulatory burdens, significantly improves access to rural broadband, helps communities meet the challenges of the opioid crises, & maintains vital nutrition assistance for those who truly need it. https://t.co/QQGBjFQvOH

The 2018 #FarmBill seeks to strengthen the farm safety net and makes other important improvements to current law that will benefit our rural communities, improve wildlife habitat, and enhance the environment.  https://t.co/QQGBjFQvOH

#NorthCarolina is blessed to be one of the most agriculturally diverse states in our great country.  Unfortunately, farm families throughout America have had to weather a 5-year recession, depressed prices resulting in a 52-percent drop in net farm income.  #FarmBill

The #schumershutdown means nearly 100,000 national guardsmen will be sent home from training.  It means that Pilot Training and other training programs will be cancelled harming our readiness and putting operations in severe jeopardy.
Our country faces the greatest foreign threats since World War II.  The #SchumerShutdown means our troops are not paid and veterans cannot receive the benefits they are rightfully due.
